dillon.gameEngine.utils

Class MainUtilities

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class MainUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getInverse

        public static int getInverse(int x,
             int height)
        This method will get the inverse of the coordinate according to the image's height. This is used to invert the x position of the camera because the image is rendered from the top left corner. This makes it so that when it is rendered, it is in the correct position.
        Parameters:
        x - The value to invert
        height - The height of the image to invert around.
        Returns:
        The inverted number.

      • executeWithEngine

        public static void executeWithEngine(java.lang.Runnable r)
        Sets the action to run on time with the game engine.
        Parameters:
        r - The action

      • executeQueue

        public static void executeQueue()
        To be used by the engine only. Violation will result in multiple queue executions or unsynchronized actions.
